dao

Class CompanyDBDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • dao.CompanyDBDAO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CompanyDAO

    public class CompanyDBDAO
extends java.lang.Object
implements CompanyDAO
    the CompanyDBDAO hold all of the methods that are responsible for the company's actions. these methods connect to the database and retrieves data for the user or write data received from the user to the database
